Use the provided learning objectives, active learning components, scaffolding layers, and flashcard schema to create 30 high-quality flashcards. MCQs: 1 correct, 3 distractors per protocol (plausible, partial, reversal). Output as JSON array: [{'front': '...', 'back': {'correct_answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'tags': [...]}, 'type': 'mcq|basic|cloze'}].
